entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
